name: blog/gravity-start-webinar
content:
blocks:
  - type: blog-header-block
    resetPaddings: true
    paddingBottom: l
    width: m
    verticalOffset: m
    theme: dark
    background:
      image:
        src: >-
          https://storage.yandexcloud.net/gravity-landing-static/blog/blog-cover-bg.png
        disableCompress: true
      color: '#CCDAFF'
      fullWidth: false
  - type: blog-layout-block
    resetPaddings: true
    mobileOrder: reverse
    children:
      - type: blog-yfm-block
        column: left
        resetPaddings: true
        text: >
          Vladimir Timofeev (Product Owner gravity-ui.com ) will tell you where
          to start getting acquainted with Gravity UI, show you the main
          elements and assemble a ready-made interface from them.
      - type: blog-media-block
        column: left
        resetPaddings: true
        youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e77kbTjqZX8
        previewImg: >-
          https://storage.yandexcloud.net/gravity-landing-static/assets/zastavka-2.png
        fullWidth: false
author: timofeyevvv
